title: JOKER FOLIE À DEUX (ENGLISH) (A)
overview: Failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harley Quinn, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Upon his release, the two of them embark on a doomed romantic misadventure.

title: STREE 2 SARKATE KA AATANK
overview: A hollow headless creature 'Sarkata' is spreading terror in the sleepy small town of Chanderi. The trio of Vicky, Jana and Bittu, along with the wise man Rudra summon 'Stree', who has her own secrets, to save them and the town from the new monster.

title: KISHKINDHA KANDAM
overview: Bizarre occurrences in a monkey-inhabited village drive a newlywed couple and forest officials to seek answers behind the strange events.
tagline: A Tale Of Three Wise Monkeys

title: TUMBBAD (RE RELEASE)
overview: India, 1918. On the outskirts of Tumbbad, a cursed village where it always rains, Vinayak, along with his mother and his brother, care of a mysterious old woman who keeps the secret of an ancestral treasure that Vinayak gets obsessed with.
tagline: A Tale of Greed Beyond Fear

title: IBBANI TABBIDA ILEYALI
overview: What defines love? Memories that you can fondly look at? Tomorrow's dream of togetherness? Or the longing after separation?  Ibbani Tabbida Ileyali is a poetic tale of romance that intends to celebrate unconditional love. An attempt to capture the essence of yesterday's romance, the relevance of today's and the perpetual nature of it that can stand the test of the future!  We aspire to make you sing, smile, dance and savour the sweet melancholy. A story that spans a decade encapsulating the days of college, career aspirations and adulthood! Urban cityscape, the greens and more importantly the dreamy atmospherics. There's a scent of summer, the warmth of winter and the melody of monsoon!

title: WHITE BIRD (ENGLISH) (U/A)
overview: Julian Albans, the bully who left Beecher Prep, is visited by his Grandmère from Paris and is transformed by her remarkable story of compassion and courage. As a girl in Nazi-occupied France, the young Grandmère goes into hiding with the help of a schoolmate, a young man who risks everything to give her the chance to survive. Together, they find beauty and love in the secret world of their own creation.
tagline: One act of kindness lives on forever.

title: A.R.M.
overview: Set in the Northern Kerala in 1900, 1950 and 1990, Three generations of heroes Maniyan, Kunjikelu and Ajayan, try to protect the most important treasure of the Land.

title: KRISHNAM PRANAYA SAKHI
overview: A wealthy tycoon's son becomes a valet to win the heart of a girl from a humble background. Determined to marry her, he faces challenges in gaining approval from her parents.

title: TRANSFORMERS ONE
overview: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but once were friends bonded like brothers who changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

title: BINNY AND FAMILY
overview: Binny's life in London turns upside down when her grandparents visit her and try to insist living her life according to them. Binny and Family throws light on the widening generation gap and that neither generation not being able to understand the other one.
tagline: Every generation has its own story

title: THE BUCKINGHAM MURDERS
overview: Fresh wounds are reopened when Jasmeet Bhamra, a cop and a single mother who recently lost her child in a shooting spree, transfers to High Wycombe and is assigned a case of a missing child.

title: MATHU VADALARA 2
overview: After the events of Part 1, delivery agents Babu and Yesu return, now as special agents on a mission. This time, they`re tackling extraordinary tasks, unleashing major laughs, unexpected twists, and endless fun.

title: DHARMVEER MUKKAM POST THANE -2 SAHEBANCHYA HINDUTV
overview: Explores Anand Dighe's life, tracing his political journey and capturing the essence of his impactful legacy as a prominent figure.

title: THE GREATEST OF ALL TIME
overview: Gandhi, a once decorated member of the Special Anti-Terrorism Squad (SATS), is called back into action by his former colleagues for an important mission, setting him on a dangerous collision course with his own past.

title: NAVRA MAZA NAVSACHA 2
overview: Bhakti and Vacky are once again on a journey to seek blessings at Ganpati Pule but this time because of their daughter Shraddha who makes an unusual and hilarious vow which she forces her fiancé to fulfill as a condition to marry her. With all the adventures and obstacles on their Konkan railway journey, will they be able to fulfill their vow this time as well?

title: VEER ZAARA (RE RELEASE)
overview: Squadron Leader Veer Pratap Singh, a pilot in the Indian Air Force, rescues the stranded Zaara, a woman from Pakistan, following a bus accident, and their lives are forever bound.

title: IT ENDS WITH US
overview: Though coming from a complicated past, Lily Bloom has always known the life she wants. While living in Boston, she meets neurosurgeon Ryle Kincaid and believes she may very well have found her soul mate. Soon, however, questions arise about their relationship, and to complicate matters, her high school love interest, Atlas Corrigan, comes back into the picture, putting her relationship with Ryle in jeopardy.

title: DEADPOOL AND WOLVERINE
overview: A listless Wade Wilson toils away in civilian life with his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. But when his homeworld faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit-up again with an even more reluctant Wolverine.

title: TAAL (RE RELEASE)
overview: Businessman Manav falls for aspiring singer, Mansi, but their romance faces an uphill climb when Manav must depart and Mansi's suave manager moves in.

title: KHEL KHEL MEIN
overview: The story revolves around a group of friends who gather for a dinner and end up revealing secrets about each other. Khel Khel Mein is the official remake of 2016's Italian comedy thriller film 'Perfect Strangers'

title: LAUGHING BUDDHA
overview: A small town head constable takes up an unofficial case to help his superior officer in order to save himself from suspension because of his overweight issue.

title: SPEAK NO EVIL
overview: When an American family is invited to spend the weekend at the idyllic country estate of a charming British family they befriended on vacation, what begins as a dream holiday soon warps into a snarled psychological nightmare.

title: DESPICABLE ME 4
overview: Gru and Lucy and their girls — Margo, Edith and Agnes — welcome a new member to the Gru family, Gru Jr., who is intent on tormenting his dad. Gru faces a new nemesis in Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina, and the family is forced to go on the run.
tagline: Things just got a little more despicable.

title: HITLER
overview: Selva’s simple life spirals into chaos as hes caught in a chase involving stolen campaign money, shootouts and a fierce clash with corruption, leading to unexpected twists.

title: KAALAPATTHAR
overview: Shankar, who serves in the Indian Army. In his hometown of Mudalpur, a statue is erected, leading to a series of confusion. Shankar returns to the town, facing the dilemma of whether to safeguard the idol or quell the unrest among the people.

title: INSIDE OUT 2
overview: Teenager Riley's mind headquarters is undergoing a sudden demolition to make room for something entirely unexpected: new Emotions! Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust, who’ve long been running a successful operation by all accounts, aren’t sure how to feel when Anxiety shows up. And it looks like she’s not alone.

title: DHILRAJA
overview: The clash between a middle-class family and wealthy, powerful youths escalates dramatically after an unexpected death. The family, now hunted by the powerful, must go to extreme lengths to protect themselves. With nowhere to turn, the ordinary man finds hope in his admiration for Rajini, revealing that even the powerless can become heroes when pushed to their limits.

title: NEVER LET GO
overview: As Evil takes over the world beyond their front doorstep, the only protection for a mother and her twin sons is their house and their family’s protective bond.

title: BIBI RAJNI
overview: A ruler craving a male heir renounces God and threatens those of his subjects who do not follow him, including his youngest daughter.
